prompt: Product captured mid-air frozen in time with automatically generated particles that match the product's material and properties. The AI will analyze the uploaded product photo to determine if it's organic, metallic, liquid, crystalline, wooden, textile, glass, or other material type. Product-appropriate particles will then explode outward in a dynamic pattern, never in front of the item. The particles will be color-coordinated and contextually relevant to the specific product (e.g., coffee grounds for coffee products, metal shavings for tools, glitter for cosmetics, wood splinters for wooden items, glass shards for glass products, fabric threads for textiles, etc.). Smart particle analysis creates perfect visual harmony between product and scattered elements. The mood is dynamic, intelligent, and perfectly matched. High-speed photography with adaptive product particles, frozen motion, intelligent lighting, 8K, smart product photography.
